paragraphs.title: Lesson 8
paragraphs.text:
In this lesson you will be querying the MapR-DB replicated table using Apache Drill in this Apache Zeppelin notebook.

The notebook consists out of a number of queries that reflect business questions about the classified image. The initial query constructs a Apache Drill view that is referenced in later parts of this notebook so therefore, it is important to perform that query first before continuing with the other queries.

paragraphs.title: Create a View for querying the classified data
paragraphs.text:
%drill
Create or Replace View 
    dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` as select 
        t.filename Filename
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 8, 4) `Year`
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 12, 2) `Month`
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 14, 2) `Day`
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 17, 2) `Hour`
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 19, 2) `Minute`
        , SUBSTR(t.filename, 17, 6) `Time`
        , t.objects.label Label
        , t.objects.confidence Confidence
        , t.objects.topleft.x TopLeftX
        , t.objects.topleft.y TopLeftY
        , t.objects.bottomright.x BottomRightX
        , t.objects.bottomright.y BottomRightY 
    from (select _Id as filename, flatten(objects) as objects from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table`) t

paragraphs.title: Count the total number of objects in the dataset.
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select count(Distinct Filename) as `Files`, count(*) as Objects from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view`

paragraphs.title: Which are the Top 5 objects that have been classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Label, count(*) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Label order by 2 desc LIMIT 5

paragraphs.title: What are the Top 3 images with the most objects classified
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select  Filename, count(*) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Filename order by 2 desc LIMIT 3

paragraphs.title: What are the Top 10 images with the most objects classified
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select  Filename, count(*) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Filename order by 2 desc Limit 10

paragraphs.title: What are the Labels for the Top 5 images with the most objects classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Filename, Label, count(Label) as `Number`  from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
where Filename in 
(select Filename from  
(select Filename, count(*) from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
Group by Filename Order By 2 Desc limit 5) vb
) group by Filename, Label Order By Filename, Label,`Number` Asc

paragraphs.title: What are the Labels for the Top 5 images with the most objects classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Label, sum(`Number`) as `Number` from
(select Filename, Label, count(Label) as `Number` from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
where Filename in 
(select Filename from  
(select Filename, count(*) from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
Group by Filename Order By 2 Desc limit 5) vb
) group by Filename, Label )
Group by Label Order By `Number` Desc

paragraphs.title: What are the Labels for the Top 5 images with the most objects classified per image?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Filename, Label, count(Label) as `Number` from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
where Filename in 
(select Filename from  
(select Filename, count(*) from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
Group by Filename Order By 2 Desc limit 5) vb
) group by Filename, Label Order By 2 Desc

paragraphs.title: What is the image with the least classified objects and at what time was it taken?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Filename,`Time`, Label, count(Label) as `Number` from  dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` 
where Filename in (select Filename from 
(select Filename, count(*) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` group by Filename order by 2 asc LIMIT 1))
Group By Filename, `Time`, Label Order By 4 Desc

paragraphs.title: What is  the spread over time of the number of images classified?
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Filename, Label, `Hour` as Uur, count(Label) Number from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view`  group by Filename, `Hour`, Label order by 3 Asc

paragraphs.title: Show graphically when we went for lunch
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select Filename, Label, `Hour` as Uur, count(Label) as `Number`  from dfs.root.`/remote-image-classification/remote-image-output-table_view` Where Label = 'person'  group by Filename, `Hour`, Label order by 3 Asc

paragraphs.title: What are the Top 10 objects identified with a confidence over 50%?
